Strings.Text: On the wall is a terminal which \noffers Extinct Point Service.{pause}{clear}The keyboard is gone. It could be \nthat a swimming reptile {pause}{clear}destroyed it.{pause}
A section of the column has \ncracked making it weak. With a {pause}{clear}weapon with a little fire power \nyou'll probably be able to {pause}{clear}destroy it.{pause}

{delay 28677}{pic}A section of the column has \ncracked making it weak.{delay 28732}{clear}{delay 28677}{pic}With a weapon with a little fire \npower you'll probably be able {delay 28732}{clear}{delay 28677}{pic}to destroy it.{delay 28702}{clear}{delay 28682}
